  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(int campID, String campName, String date, String registerCloseDate, String userGrp, String location, String desc, String staffInCharge, int totalSlots, int committeeSlots, boolean visibility)
      Constructor of Camp object Initialises the various variables attached to this camp
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the camp
      campName - Name of the camp
      date - Date that the camp is held
      registerCloseDate - Registration Closing Date
      userGrp - Faculty of this camp
      location - Where the camp is held
      desc - Description of the camp
      staffInCharge - Name of staff that created the camp
      totalSlots - Number of slots available for students to join
      committeeSlots - Number of committee member slots available for students to join (Max 10)
      visibility - Whether the camp can be seen by students

    • AddAttendee

      public boolean AddAttendee(Student student)
      Adds student to the list of attendees
      Parameters:
      student - Student that wants to join the camp
      Returns:
      True if student is successfully registered in the camp, False if unable to register for the camp

    • RemoveAttendee

      public boolean RemoveAttendee(Student student)
      Removes student from the list of attendees and adds them to the list of students that have withdrawn from the camp
      Parameters:
      student - The Student that wants to withdraw from the camp
      Returns:
      True if student have successfully withdrawn, False if student is unable to withdraw

    • GetStudentRemoved

      public ArrayList<Student> GetStudentRemoved()
      Gets the list of students that have withdrawn from the camp
      Returns:
      List of student that withdrawn from this camp

    • AddCommitteeMember

      public boolean AddCommitteeMember(CCM ccm)
      Adds student to the committee member list
      Parameters:
      ccm - student(of type CCM) that wants to register as a committee member
      Returns:
      True if student have successfully registered, False if they failed to register

    • AddSuggestion

      public void AddSuggestion(CCM committee, Suggestions suggestion)
      Adds the suggestion from a committee member to the list of suggestions by that member
      Parameters:
      committee - The Committee member that suggested the suggestion
      suggestion - The suggestion made by the member

    • RemoveSuggestion

      public boolean RemoveSuggestion(CCM committee, Suggestions suggestion)
      Removes suggestion from camp's list of suggestions by the committee member
      Parameters:
      committee - The Committee mmeber that suggested the suggestion
      suggestion - The suggestion to be deleted
      Returns:
      True if suggestion have been deleted, False if not deleted

    • AddEnquiry

      public void AddEnquiry(Student student, Enquiries enquiry)
      Adds enquiry made by the student to the camp's list of enquiries by that student
      Parameters:
      student - The student that submitted the enquiry
      enquiry - The enquiry that the student submitted

    • RemoveEnquiry

      public boolean RemoveEnquiry(Student student, Enquiries enquiry)
      Removes the enquiry from the camp's list of enquiries by that student
      Parameters:
      student - The student that submitted the enquiry
      enquiry - The enquiry to be deleted
      Returns:
      True if enquiry have been deleted, False if not deleted

    • GetEnquiry

      public Enquiries GetEnquiry(Student student, String enquiry)
      Gets a particular enquiry submitted by student
      Parameters:
      student - The student that submitted the enquiry
      enquiry - The question that the student asked
      Returns:
      Enquiries object with infomation on who asked, status, the query, replies

    • GetEnquiries

      public HashMap<Student,ArrayList<Enquiries>> GetEnquiries()
      Gets map of students to their list of enquiries about the camp
      Returns:
      Map of student to their list of enquiries about this camp

    • GetSuggestion

      public HashMap<CCM,ArrayList<Suggestions>> GetSuggestion()
      Gets map of committee member to their list of suggestion of the camp
      Returns:
      Map of committee member to their list of suggestion of this camp

    • CanRegister

      public boolean CanRegister()
      Checks if the registration date has passed
      Returns:
      True if students are still allowed to register, False otherwise

    • DeleteCamp

      public void DeleteCamp()
      Handles the deletion of this camp i.e removes this camp from student's list of registered camps, if a student was a committee member of this camp, remove their ccm status
